p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Food Service Dates: Monday-Friday, beginning March 18th through April 3

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Food Service Pick-up Locations Include the Following:

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Meal pick-up hours of service will be from 7:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. (one time per day) at the following locations:

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: CCHS (#1 Greenwave Circle) - Roundabout

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Numa (601 Discovery Dr) - Drop off area

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Northside (340 Venturacci Ln.) - Drop off area

display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Remote Drop-offs for Rural Households--Drop will be from 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. at the following stops:

li.small: Paiute Dr. and Rio Vista Rd.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.small: UPDATE TO POLICY: CHILDREN RECEIVING MEALS NEED NOT BE PRESENT DURING PICK-UP. Parents/guardians can pick up the meals for their children without having all family members present.

span.strong: 4-1-2020—Update for Food Services Remote Drop-Off Locations:

small.style: display: block;

div.small: To better serve ChurchillCSD families, we have added 3 more sites for the remote drop-off routes.

small.style: display: block;

div.small: Beginning Monday, April 6th, 2020 Food Services will now be offering pick-up sites at Allen Road/Mt. View, Serpa Way/Broadway Street, and Silver State/Gummow Road. These sites will also have WiFi access

small.style: display: block;

div.small: Remote drop-off pick-up times will remain the same (10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m.) and all buses will continue to offer wifi services (except for Bus 53 @ Churchill Village).

a.strong: 3-23-2020—Click here to view a Message from the CCHS Kitchen Manager

span.strong: 3-19-2020—Update for Food Services Remote Drop-Off Locations:

small.style: display: block;
display: block;

div.small: - Instead of the Harmon Junction stop, Bus #37 will be at the corner of Paiute Dr. and Rio Vista Rd.

span.strong: 3-18-2020—Update for Food Services Remote Drop-Off Locations:

small.style: display: block;

div.small: Two bus stops beginning Thursday, March 19, 2020, will be changed to the following:

small.style: display: block;

div.small: - Instead of the Pasture/Wildes Road stop, Bus #29 will be at the Sand Cholla/NASF stop

small.style: display: block;

div.small: - Instead of stopping at ReadyMix, Bus #8 will be parked at 1775 Auction Rd.

small.style: display: block;

div.small: These stops will take place from 10:00-11:00a.m.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Beginning Wednesday, March 18th, 2020 ChurchillCSD Food Services will provide free breakfast and lunch for all Churchill County School District students and siblings ages 0-18 (no baby food or formula provided).

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Meals will include one breakfast and one lunch per day per bag

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Meals will be served in bags in a “grab ‘n go” style either in a drive-thru or walk-up method

small.style: display: block; margin-right: 0; text-align: left;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Comidas durante el cierre de la escuela

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.small: A partir del miércoles 18 de marzo de 2020: ChurchillCSD Food Services proporcionará desayuno y almuerzo gratis para todos los estudiantes y hermanos del Distrito Escolar del Condado de Churchill de 0 a 18 años (no se proporciona comida para bebés ni fórmula).

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Las comidas incluirán un desayuno y un almuerzo por día por bolsa.Las comidas se servirán en bolsas en un estilo de "agarrar y llevar", ya sea en un método drive-thru o walk-up

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: De lunes a viernes, desde el 18 de marzo hasta el 30 de abril.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: El horario de servicio de recogida de comidas será de 7:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. (una vez por día)

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.span: Los lugares de recogida incluirán lo siguiente:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: ChurchillCSD has buses at the following sites from 10:00-11:00 a.m. beginning Wednesday, March 18th and every weekday (M-F) through April 3. The following bus stops are equipped with Wifi and can be used by students to check school emails, log into Google Classrooms and save work as Offline Docs to work at home during the day--Students should open any tabs that they will need during the day.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: The district is working to help families find WiFi connections as we don't want to encourage students to congregate in large groups throughout town during the day. We do encourage families to look into alternates for getting Wifi to your homes, if you do not currently have Wifi access. You can contact your phone providers to see if they are offering any assistance with Wifi access or increased mobile data at this time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Below are links to information from internet/phone providers in our area:

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The district has posted surveys for elementary and MS/HS regarding the need for internet service. We ask that anyone with internet connectivity or availability of using wireless devices as hotspots please do so during this time. We will begin helping students at the secondary gain access and then move on to elementary students’ households that are still in need.

span.strong: 3-18-2020—Update for Food Services Rural Drop-Off Locations:

small.style: display: block;

div.small: Two bus stops beginning Thursday, March 19, 2020, will be changed to the following:

small.style: display: block;

div.small: - Instead of the Pasture/Wildes Road stop, Bus #29 will be at the Sand Cholla/NASF stop

small.style: display: block;

div.small: - Instead of stopping at ReadyMix, Bus #8 will be parked at 1775 Auction Rd.

small.style: display: block;

div.small: These stops will take place from 10:00-11:00a.m.

span.strong: Resources for Family's Experiencing Financial Hardship:

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

span.a: Southwest Gas begins temporary moratorium on natural gas disconnections

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: is starting a temporary moratorium on natural gas disconnections for non-payment that is in effect until further notice.

span.a: NV Energy Temporarily Suspends Disconnections Due to Coronavirus

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: Customers undergoing financial hardship or isolation are urged to call NV Energy's customer service line at 775-834-4444 for Northern Nevada customers.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

small.style: display: block;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: You can file an unemployment claim 24/7 at

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: the fastest way to file.

small.style: display: block;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: On Monday, March 16, the Nevada Department of Employment, Training and Rehabilitation (DETR) will have expanded system and staffing to accommodate any increase in unemployment insurance (UI) claims. Telephone claim call center hours will increase to 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., Monday through Friday to provide support in English and Spanish with additional translation available as needed. With the convenience of 24-hr filing, claimants are highly encouraged to use the internet to file their UI claims.
